description: Monitor your JMeter load test in real time with InfluxDB and Grafana.

targets.query: SELECT sum("count")  FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$ThroughputFilter$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("grpThreads")/60  FROM "$JMeterResults_tail" WHERE  ("label" =~ /^$ThroughputFilter$/)  AND time > now() -60s GROUP BY  time(1000ms) fill(null)
SELECT count("count")/5 FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE  ("label" =~ /^$ThroughputFilter$/)  AND time > now()-5s GROUP BY  time(1000ms) fill(null)

SELECT sum("count”)/$__interval_ms  FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction"  =~ /^$ThroughputFilter$/ AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ ) AND time > now()-5s GROUP BY time(1000ms) fill(null))

SELECT sum("error") / sum("all") FROM (SELECT sum("count") AS "all" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)), (SELECT sum("countError") AS "error" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null))

SELECT mean("count") / $send_interval FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$ThroughputFilter$/ AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("maxAT") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("grpThreads") FROM "$JMeterResults_tail" WHERE ("label" =~ /^$ThroughputFilter$/ AND $timeFilter ) GROUP BY "label", time($__interval)
SELECT count("grpThreads")/($__interval_ms/1000)  FROM "$JMeterResults_tail" WHERE  ("label" =~ /^$ThroughputFilter$/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "label", time($__interval)  fill(null)
SELECT count("grpThreads")*1000/$__interval_ms  FROM "$JMeterResults_tail" WHERE ("label" =~ /^$ThroughputFilter$/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "label", time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count")/5 FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE  ("transaction" =~ /^$ThroughputFilter$/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time(5000ms) fill(null)
SELECT mean("pct95.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("pct95.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$ThroughputFilter$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "statut" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction"
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "responseCode" !~ /^$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction","responseCode","responseMessage"
select distinct("failureMessage")  from  jmeter_JMeterResults_tail where ( success=~ /^false/ and dataType ='text' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "label","responseCode","failureMessage"
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("error") / sum("all") FROM (SELECT sum("count") AS "all" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)), (SELECT sum("count") AS "error" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ko' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null))
SELECT last("count") / $send_interval FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT cumulative_sum("count")  FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter
SELECT cumulative_sum("count")  FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ko' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("avg") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("pct50.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("pct90.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("pct95.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("pct99.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("max") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT max(max)/1000, percentile("pct90.0", 90)/1000 as "pct90.0", percentile("pct95.0",95)/1000 as "pct95.0", percentile("pct99.0",99)/1000 as "pct99.0" FROM "jmeterBackendListener" WHERE transaction =~ /^$ThroughputFilter/ AND $timeFilter Group by transaction
SELECT sum("count") FROM $measurement_name WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND  "statut" = 'ok' AND  transaction =~ /^$ThroughputFilter/ ) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", "statut"
SELECT sum("count") FROM $measurement_name WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "statut" = 'ko' ) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", "statut"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$measurement_name" WITH KEY = "application"
list.name: application
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$measurement_name" WITH KEY = "application"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$measurement_name" WITH KEY = "transaction" WHERE "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all'
list.name: transaction
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$measurement_name" WITH KEY = "transaction" WHERE "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$measurement_name" WITH KEY = "transaction" WHERE "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all'
list.name: ThroughputFilter
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$measurement_name" WITH KEY = "transaction" WHERE "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all'

title: JMeter Cooper Performance Dashboard
